description.title: Description
description.default: Choose a machine with a discount per order

label_mobile.title: Tab label for mobile
label_mobile.description: To shorten the displayed label on mobile (e.g. Professional overflows in mobile)

a11y_label.title: A11y label
a11y_label.description: Accessible label read by screen readers when on a tab or a tabpanel

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: Choose the technology icon to display

link.title: URL of the link
link.description: Relative link start with ./ to keep current path. Use {market} or {lang} variables, and they will be overwritten with your market's value if used.

sku.title: Product Color SKU
sku.description: SKU of the next product color

link.title: Product Color Link
link.description: If you need another link than the PDP

show_ratings.title: Show ratings
show_ratings.description: Show Ratings for product block (only for machines and accessories)

minimum_rating.title: Minimum Rating
minimum_rating.description: Rating below this value won't be display

show_voltage.title: Show Voltage?
show_voltage.description: Activate it only if you sell machines with different voltage

text.title: Subscription text
text.defaut: Get your machine fully refunded through {price} discount on the next {orders} coffee orders!

orders.title: Orders number (for price discount)
orders.description: Number of orders after which machine will be refunded

img_text_box.title: Popin - Text and Image block
img_text_box.description: Text and Image block at the bottom of popin (leave blank if not required)

mobile.title: URL Image Set Mobile
mobile.description: URL to image 343 x 258 pixels (or 343 x 429 pixels if video)

desktop.title: URL Image Set Desktop
desktop.description: URL to image 680 x 509 pixels (or 680 x 383 pixels if video)

alt.title: Image set alternative text
alt.description: Fill this field with a meaningful image description

contrast.title: Contrast
contrast.description: Handles text color. For dark backgrounds, we use a light text color (e.g. white). For light backgrounds, we use a dark text color (e.g. black)

background.title: Background images
background.description: Find all information about this component on https://wiki.nespresso.com/x/AZqFC

background_image_alt.title: Alt Background image & SEO
background_image_alt.description: Describe the image used to drive customers and seo bot

id.title: Identifier
id.default: Default campaign ID (tracking missing in Page Builder export)

name.title: Name
name.default: Default campaign name (tracking missing in Page Builder export)

creative.title: Creative on site
creative.description: e.g. `responsive_hp_main` please refer to wiki: INTERNAL CAMPAIGN TRACKING PROCESS

position.title: Position on site
position.default: Default campaign Position (tracking missing in Page Builder export)

default.id: Default campaign ID (tracking missing in Page Builder export)
default.name: Default campaign name (tracking missing in Page Builder export)
default.position: Default campaign Position (tracking missing in Page Builder export)
